title: Always Faithful
description: Love was the only thing either of them were looking for. Except, neither of them knew it. Addison just wanted to get her life back.She wanted to live her life for herself and not because of other's expectations and demands. Ryan wanted to find something to fill his life after the Marine Corps. He had a stellar Marine Corps career and as he came to the end of it, what would he do afterwards? Nothing was more important to him than the Marines. After a turn of events throw each of them together, they learn that they need each other in order to feel complete. But pride and egos get in the way of everything for them. Can they figure out how to be happy and how to be always faithful to each other?
author: Ann Popp
